response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product holds immense value to us, but I understand its worth might be different for you. I am extending this opportunity to purchase it for $12,000. I believe this price reflects its quality, craftsmanship, and potential benefits to you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 12000}
